name: telegram-music-downloader-bot
description: YouTube Music Downloader Bot for Telegram.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot at BotFather http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the token of your bot

API_ID.description: you can get apiid from https://my.telegram.org/auth

API_HASH.description: you can get apiid from https://my.telegram.org/auth

DATA_URL.description: make a Mongo DB database and get url

DATA_NAME.description: Give a Mongo db collection name
